name: Golem Shrine
description:
Once upon a time, there was a young blacksmith apprentice called Evaw. He was ordered to gather some stones in a temple near his village. As Evaw entered the temple, he found a glowing gauntlet at display in a pillar of the temple that had the strange inscription: "Only the chosen may face the perils that lies within the gauntlet." As he put the gauntlet dazzled with its beauty, golems descended upon the temple…

Keyboard control scheme

To walk: up, left, right, down to walk

To aim: w,a,s,d to aim the gauntlet

To shoot: simply press space bar

Move mirrors: 1 for left mirror up and Q for left mirror down

3 for right mirror up and E for right mirror down
